info.description: The Philippines' most famous fastfood chain. Jollibee's signature products are their burgers and world-famous chickenjoy.
A local chinese food chain. Dimsum break offers delicious dimsums, noodles, and rolls.
Pochero is a cebuano dish which is equivalent to the tagalogs' Bulalo. Here at Malou's they do Pochero well!
The biggest chinese fastfood chain in the Philippines. Chowking's lauriats are just amazing.
While not as popular as Jollibee in the Philippines, McDonald's burgers and fries are still some of the best in the world.
